title: Rock & Republic Men's Relaxed Straight Jean
description: RELAXED FIT. Casual and comfortable, these men's jeans are built with a relaxed fit through the hip and thigh for unrestricted movement and a casual look.

HIGH-PERFORMANCE FABRIC. Made for men on the move, these jeans are constructed with ultra-comfort denim that delivers movement and style. This high-performance fabric maintains lasting quality for all-day wear.
CASUAL STYLING. These relaxed-fit jeans are perfect for casual weekends and chill hangouts. Throw on your favorite sneakers and head out the door, you're ready to rock for whatever you have planned.

PREMIUM DETAILS. These jeans come in a variety of washes with worn-in details so they look like your longtime favorites. Elevated stitched details, a Rock & Republic embroidered logo and the perfect amount of distressing make these jeans a standout.

5-POCKET JEANS. Built with extra storage for your phone, keys, wallet and more, these jeans feature classic 5-pocket styling with (2) front pockets, (1) watch pocket and (2) back pockets. Leg Opening: 17.5"
